text: avaru ‘‘nannodeya, nanagondu puraveyannu odagisu’’ endaru. Avanu helidanu; ‘‘nimagiruva puraveyenendare muru dinagala kala nimage, janarodane kaisannegalannu maduva horatu berenu matanadalikkagadu. (Niviga) nim'modeyanannu pade pade smarisiri hagu munjavinallu irulallu avana pavitravannu japisiri’’
